member.summary: A compiled ABML expression ready for execution.

member.summary: Gets the number of registers needed.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.ConstantPool
member.summary: Builds the constant pool for a compiled expression.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.ConstantPool.Count
member.summary: Gets the current number of constants.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.ConstantPool.Add(System.Object)
member.summary: Adds a constant and returns its index.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.ConstantPool.Contains(System.Object)
member.summary: Checks if pool contains a constant.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.ConstantPool.TryGetIndex(System.Object,System.Byte@)
member.summary: Tries to get index of existing constant.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.ExpressionCompiler
member.summary: Compiles ABML expression AST into bytecode. Thread-safe: each compilation uses its own state.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.ExpressionCompiler.Compile(System.String)
member.summary: Compiles an expression string to bytecode.

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.CompilerVisitor
member.summary: Internal visitor that holds compilation state. A new instance is created for each compilation to ensure thread safety.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.CompilerVisitor.AllLiterals(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorCompiler.Compiler.Ast.ExpressionNode},System.Object[]@)
member.summary: Checks if all elements are literals and extracts their values.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.Instruction.A
member.summary: Gets the A operand (usually destination register).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.Instruction.B
member.summary: Gets the B operand (source 1 or constant index).

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.Instruction.C
member.summary: Gets the C operand (source 2 or constant index).

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.Instruction.#ctor(System.UInt32)
member.summary: Creates an instruction from packed value.

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.OpCode.And
member.summary: R[A] = R[B] && R[C] (non-short-circuit, use jumps for short-circuit)

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.OpCode.JumpIfTrue
member.summary: if R[A] is truthy then PC = (B << 8) | C

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.OpCode.JumpIfFalse
member.summary: if R[A] is falsy then PC = (B << 8) | C

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.OpCode.JumpIfNull
member.summary: if R[A] == null then PC = (B << 8) | C

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.OpCode.JumpIfNotNull
member.summary: if R[A] != null then PC = (B << 8) | C

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.OpCode.CallArgs
member.summary: Specifies arg count for following Call. A = argCount

member.name: F:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.OpCode.Call
member.summary: R[A] = Call(constants[B], args starting at R[C])
member.remarks: Must be preceded by CallArgs instruction that specifies arg count. B encodes function name index in constants. Args are in R[C], R[C+1], ..., R[C+argCount-1].

member.name: T:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.RegisterAllocator
member.summary: Manages register allocation during expression compilation.

member.name: P:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.RegisterAllocator.UsedCount
member.summary: Gets the total number of registers used.

member.name: M:BeyondImmersion.Bannou.BehaviorExpressions.Compiler.RegisterAllocator.AllocateRange(System.Int32)
member.summary: Allocates a contiguous range of registers.
